response.body:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
  <soap:Body>
    <soap:Fault>
      <faultcode>soap:Client</faultcode>
      <faultstring>Message size exceeds maximum limit (10MB)</faultstring>
      <detail>
        <ErrorCode>MESSAGE_TOO_LARGE</ErrorCode>
      </detail>
    </soap:Fault>
  </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>
